data.message:
Hi facebook,
i am Ali please defined me how to verify my page in pakistan?

replies.message: Hey there. If you're an admin of a local business Page, you may be eligible for a gray verification badge, which you'll see in your Page's settings. Learn more: http://bit.ly/1ScyLwU. If your Page represents a celebrity, public figure, sports team, media or entertainment, you may be eligible for a blue verification badge. To see if your Page is eligible, please fill out this form: http://bit.ly/1Mw78zM. -Jordan
sorry this link is not fond may be it's Pakistan users problem please Gite me :-( Mark Zuckerberg
